nodes.text: Dorgat was a human mercenary who operated during the Galactic Civil War.
Dorgat was major in the Dwitzel's Rats mercenary unit, and the second of Dwitzel.
He could have been a pirate before his recruitment.
Dorgat was brutal and ferocious but effective.
Dorgat was created by Jean Balczesak for an ambiguously canon roleplaying Gamemaster help which appeared in the French magazine Casus Belli 67.
